apt_description: Silent Librarianis a group that has targeted research and proprietary data at universities, government agencies, and private sector companies worldwide since at least 2013. Members ofSilent Librarianare known to have been affiliated with the Iran-based Mabna Institute which has conducted cyber intrusions at the behest of the government of Iran, specifically the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC).[1][2][3]
